item.description:
"The PawSox will host their 4th Annual Star Wars Day at McCoy Stadium on Sunday, May 13 when the PawSox take on the Columbus Clippers at 1:05 pm. More than 30 Star Wars characters from the Alderaan Base of the Rebel Legion - the largest, sanctioned Star Wars Fan Club in New England - will be in attendance to meet and greet fans before, during, and after the game. (For more info on the Star Wars characters please see their web site at www.alderaanbase.com/)." - from www.Pawsox.com

We'll be going for the reserved seats, $11.  I'll get tickets Sometime in April.  I will update the details when I do.

cheers,

John
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a VT hat.
item.name: Pawsox 4th Annual Star Wars Day
